## Homework Example

This is an example of how to get a random valule from the normal distribution where $\mu=4$ and $\sigma=2$


```{r}
rnorm(1,mean=4,sd=2)
```

### Loading data
```{r}
ch06 <- read.csv("data/5e/ch06.csv",header=TRUE)
nrow(ch06)
names(ch06)

x <- na.omit(ch06$Table6.2) ; x

n <- length(x) ; n


```
